Franz Liszt

Apparitions, S. 155

1834 · LW A19 · R. 11

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 18' 30"

  • 1. Senza lentezza quasi allegretto
  • 2. Vivamente
  • 3. Fantaisie sur une valse de François Schubert

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · I/9 · Z. A/B 8011 · Various Cyclical Works I · ed. Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok

1. Senza lentezza quasi allegretto

Duration: 6' 30"

Difficulty: 4

2. Vivamente

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 4

3. Fantaisie sur une valse de François Schubert

This piece is based on a dance by Franz Schubert: no. 33 of the thirty-six Originaltänze (D 365).

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 4.5
